name: Transferred to 2.1.1.202 and 2.1.1.203 and 2.1.1.204
comment: Transferred entry: tRNA (cytosine-5-)-methyltransferase. Now covered by EC 2.1.1.202 [multisite-specific tRNA:(cytosine-C5)-methyltransferase], EC 2.1.1.203 [tRNA (cytosine34-C5)-methyltransferase] and EC 2.1.1.204 [RNA (cytosine38-C5)-methyltransferase].
